Become an Email Reseller with Soverin

Profitable, Premium, Privacy-first Email
Get started
Scroll to Learn More

Empower your business & clients with Mailbox Guard

a premium, hassle-free, privacy-first email

Tired of battling with complex email setups? Soverin offers a smarter, easier way to become an email service provider (ESP). Resell Mailbox Guard, our whitelabel, privacy-first email solution under your own brand, unlocking a new revenue stream without the complexities of managing your own infrastructure

Benefits of Trusting Soverin

Boost your revenue

With a premium, privacy-first email solution.

Differentiate yourself

By offering uparalleled email services

Provide exceptional value

To your clients with advanced features

Ready to unlock the power of email reselling and build your own prosperous kingdom? Get started with Mailbox Guard today!

Would you like to know more about our reseller program or go fully branded?

With Soverin, you can also white-label your email offering.

Contact us. Let’s discuss your specific needs so you can embark on your quest to email reseller success.

Contact Us

Focus on GROWTH, not infrastructure

Built like a fortress, Mailbox Guard is designed to protect user data. We've ensured that setting it up is as effortless as it is low-maintenance.

  • Stand out from the crowd by offering a service that is scalable, steady and secure.
  • Say goodbye to complex setups and lengthy onboarding processes and hello to an advanced solution that you can get up and running in no time.
  • Get started instantly with our out-of-the-box reseller program which includes self-service online purchases and activation.

Profit with Premium Features

  1. Advanced Spam Management:

    Shield your clients from unwanted emails.

  2. GDPR/Compliance Tools:

    Ensure data security with built-in ironclad compliance features.

  3. Online Reputation Protection:

    Safeguard your clients' online image.

  4. High Availability & Deliverability:

    Guarantee reliable email delivery through Soverin’s MX certificate.

  5. Easy Management:

    Obtain exceptional support and basic branding tools.

Boost your bottom line with no hidden costs

Boost your profits by joining our profitable partnership program. Get access to our intuitive email platform for a low monthly cost, starting with a €250 fee. Besides, you can earn substantial margins on mailbox subscriptions through our tiered pricing model, receiving discounts of 20% to 40% based on your total mailbox volume, with payments going directly to you.

At Soverin, we make sure that sending your emails is like sending a letter in a sealed envelope, not an open postcard everyone can read.
